alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 3:15PM PST until December 23 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 1 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one quarter to one half of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, Willapa Hills and I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Thursday to 1 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures appear most likely to warm above freezing late Friday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
